auth.signInDescription: Sign in to access the Web Dispatcher configuration editor.
auth.createAccountDescription: Register to request access to the Web Dispatcher Editor. An administrator must approve your account before you can sign in.
auth.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
auth.noAdminYet: No admin configured yet. Please {registerLink} first to become the initial super admin.
auth.passwordResetSuccess: Your password has been updated. Please sign in with your new password.
auth.resetPasswordDescription: Enter your email and we'll send you a reset link if the address is registered.
auth.resetLinkSent: If this email is registered, a password reset link has been sent. Please check your inbox.
auth.githubOnlyError: You signed up with GitHub. Please use the GitHub login button instead.
auth.setNewPasswordDescription: Enter a new password for your account. The password must be at least 8 characters long.
auth.checkEmailDescription: We've sent a confirmation link to {email}. Please click the link to verify your account.
auth.confirmLinkExpiry: The confirmation link expires after 24 hours. If it expires, use the button below to request a new one.
auth.didntReceiveEmail: Didn't receive the email? Check your spam folder or request a new confirmation link.
auth.emailNotFound: Email address not found. Please register again.
auth.pendingApprovalDescription: Your email has been confirmed. An administrator will review your registration request and you'll receive an email once your account is approved.
auth.noResponseHint: If you have not received a response within 24 hours, please contact your SAP administrator directly.
auth.subtitle: Configuration management for SAP administrators

status.unconfirmed: Please confirm your email address before signing in.
status.pending_approval: Your account is pending administrator approval.
status.rejected: Your access request has been rejected. Please contact an administrator.
status.deactivated: Your account has been deactivated. Please contact an administrator.
status.server_error: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
status.unknown_status: Your account status could not be determined. Please contact an administrator.
status.default: An error occurred. Please try again.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.welcome: Welcome to the SAP Web Dispatcher configuration editor.
dashboard.portEditorDescription: Manage icm/server_port_* parameters with validation and conflict detection.
dashboard.rulesEditorDescription: Edit URL rewrite rules for routing and redirection.
dashboard.userManagementDescription: Approve or reject user access requests and manage team members.

portEditor.title: Instance Profile Port Editor
portEditor.subtitle: Manage {code} parameters
portEditor.unknownFormat: Unknown format -- not editable in structured mode
portEditor.duplicatePortDescription: Duplicate a port entry with a new port value.
portEditor.portDescription: Must be between 1 and 65535 and unique.
portEditor.extraParamsDescription: Comma-separated in KEY=VALUE format. Known keys: EXTBIND, NOLISTEN, PROCTIMEOUT, KEEPALIVE.
portEditor.commentPlaceholder: e.g. External HTTP entry for load balancer
portEditor.commentDescription: Optional. Stored as a # comment above the port entry in the file (max. 200 characters).
portEditor.portDuplicate: Port {port} is already used by another entry.
portEditor.checkingRules: Checking rewrite rules for port references...
portEditor.rulesCheckError: Rules integrity check not possible -- please check rules.txt manually.
portEditor.rulesFoundDescription: {count} rewrite rules in rules.txt reference port {port}:
portEditor.rulesFoundHint: If you delete this port, the rules will remain and become inconsistent. Please update them in the Rules Editor afterwards.
portEditor.allPortsDeletedDescription: This is the last port entry. After deletion, the Web Dispatcher will no longer be reachable.
portEditor.rulesWarningToast: There are {count} rules in rules.txt for port {oldPort}. These will not be automatically updated to port {newPort}.
portEditor.fileNotFound: File not found: {error}. Please check Settings.
portEditor.lockFailed: Could not acquire lock. Read-only mode active.
portEditor.lockReacquireFailed: Could not re-acquire lock after commit. Please reload the page.
portEditor.lockNetworkError: Network error while acquiring lock. Please reload the page.

lockBanner.lockFailedReadonly: The file is displayed in read-only mode. Changes cannot be saved.
lockBanner.fileLockedByYou: You have locked this file for editing.
lockBanner.lockExpiredAdmin: The lock has expired. An admin can release it.

rulesEditor.title: Rules.txt Rewrite Editor
rulesEditor.subtitle: Manage URL rewrite rules for routing and redirection
rulesEditor.noPortsWarning: No ports configured in Instance Profile. Please create ports in the {link} first before creating new rules.
rulesEditor.noRules: No rules found. Add the first rule.
rulesEditor.readOnlyRawText: Read-only mode. Changes in raw text are disabled.
rulesEditor.rawTextHint: Changes in raw text will be automatically parsed when switching tabs.
rulesEditor.duplicateRuleDescription: Duplicate a rule with a new name.
rulesEditor.commentDescription: Displayed as a comment line (#) above the rule.
rulesEditor.conditionDescription: Appended with && after the port condition. Optional.
rulesEditor.targetUrlDescription: URL to which the request will be forwarded.
rulesEditor.rewriteUrlDescription: New URL path for the request.
rulesEditor.globalRulesInfo: Global rules without %{SERVER_PORT} condition. These are only editable in raw text mode.
rulesEditor.deleteRuleDescriptionNamed: Delete rule "{comment}" (Port {port})? The rule will be completely removed from the file (including comment line).
rulesEditor.deleteRuleDescriptionPort: Delete rule for port {port}? The rule will be completely removed from the file (including comment line).
rulesEditor.noPortsTooltip: No ports configured in Instance Profile. Please create ports first.
rulesEditor.fileNotFound: File not found: {error}. Please check Settings.

validation.emailRequired: Please enter a valid email address.
validation.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters.
validation.commentMaxLength: Comment must be 200 characters or less

admin.title: User Management
admin.subtitle: Manage user registrations, access control, and roles.
admin.searchPlaceholder: Search by name, email, or GitHub username...
admin.noUsersMatch: No users match the current filters.
admin.deactivateDescription: Are you sure you want to deactivate {name}? Their active sessions will be invalidated and they will no longer be able to access the application.
admin.rejectDescription: Reject the registration request from {name}. You can optionally provide a reason.

settings.title: Global Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure the GitHub repository, authentication, and file paths for the configuration editors.
settings.githubRepoDescription: Configure the GitHub repository and authentication for configuration file access.
settings.repositoryDescription: Enter as owner/repo (e.g. acme/web-dispatcher-config) or full GitHub URL.
settings.patDescriptionExisting: A PAT is already stored. Leave blank to keep the current token, or enter a new one to replace it.
settings.patDescriptionNew: Required. Create a fine-grained PAT with "Contents: Read and write" permission on the repository.
settings.patRequired: A GitHub PAT is required for the initial setup.
settings.devBranchDescription: All commits will be pushed to this branch. Default: dev.
settings.filePathsDescription: Specify the paths to configuration files within the repository.
settings.instanceProfilePathDescription: Path to the instance profile file in the repository (e.g. config/instance_profile).
settings.rulesTxtPathDescription: Path to the rules.txt file in the repository (e.g. config/rules.txt).
settings.saveError: An unexpected error occurred while saving.
settings.activeLockSingle: A file is currently being edited by another user.
settings.activeLockHint: Changing settings now may cause issues for ongoing edits.
settings.unconfiguredDescription: The application has not been set up yet. Please contact an administrator to configure the GitHub repository connection in Settings.

github.commitDescription: Review your changes and create a commit to the dev branch.
github.commitMessageCount: {count}/200 -- Your name and email will be added automatically.
github.conflictDescription: The file has been modified since you loaded it by {author} ({date}).
github.fileDeletedDescription: The file has been deleted on GitHub. Would you like to recreate it?
github.noGithubUsername: Your user profile has no GitHub username. Please contact the admin.
github.noRepoAccessDescription: Your GitHub account ({username}) does not have access to the repository -- please contact the admin.
